AboutPage.text: This application was created as part of the React course by RSSchool. If you also want todive into the world of IT and specifically into the world of frontend development,
AboutPage.rsLinkText: enroll in the frontend development course
AboutPage.descriptionEnd: ! We are a team of budding developers, unafraid of challenges and always moving forward. Our application is built to assist others by enabling requests to any open APIs. Whether you're making RESTful requests or diving into GraphQL, our platform is designed to empower your projects.
